description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.5eFXvlgX1Mc75J8R]{Dead Lift}

You are capable of incredible bursts of strength for a brief time.

Prerequisites: Str 17

Benefit: Once per day, you can treat your Strength score as 4 times higher for calculating carry capacity for 1 minute. Additionally, when you roll an Athletics check, you can roll twice and take the higher result; if you do, the other benefits of this feat end immediately. When the benefits of this feat end, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.JGFn4MrDZ6X5vrzU]{fatigued} condition for 10 minutes.

modifiers.name: Effect: Dead Lift
modifiers.notes: Once per day, you can treat your Strength score as 4 times higher for calculating carry capacity for 1 minute. Additionally, when you roll an Athletics check, you can roll twice and take the higher result; if you do, the other benefits of this feat end immediately. When the benefits of this feat end, you gain the fatigued condition for 10 minutes.
